sense.gloss: to jump, to leap, to spring, to bound, to hop
to spatter, to scatter, to splash, to fly (e.g. of sparks)
to flee, to run off, to escape
to disappear, to vanish, to fade, to thin out
to break off, to come off, to fall off, to blow (of a fuse)
to be sent out (of an order), to fly (of false rumours, catcalls, etc.)
to come flying (of a punch, kick, etc.)
to be missing (of a page, stitch, etc.), to skip, to jump (e.g. of a conversation)
to soar (esp. of spirits and gods)

sdata.j: ↑翔太↑↓しょうた↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に↑会↑↓あ↓うのが↑恥↑↓は↓ずかしいと↑言↑↓い↓いました。
sdata.e: Shota said that he was shy about seeing her.

sdata.j: おめーが↑大↑↓だい↓↑翔↑↓しょう↓か？↑今↑↓いま↓までずいぶんとでかい↑顔↑↓かお↓してくれたなあ？
sdata.e: You're Daisho? Up till now you've really lorded it over us haven't you?

sdata.j: ボクが↑憧↑↓あこが↓れたのは↑翔太↑↓しょうた↓↑部長↑↓ぶちょう↓の『↑力↑↓ちから↓』じゃない。↑体↑↓からだ↓を↑張↑↓は↓ってでも↑信念↑↓しんねん↓を↑貫↑↓つらぬ↓こうとする↑雄々↑↓おお↓しい↑勇気↑↓ゆうき↓だったはず。
sdata.e: What I looked up to in Shota was not his 'strength'. It was his heroic courage to put his life on the line to carry out his convictions.
